alert.note: Alert for Baylor; Foard; Wichita; Wilbarger (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 23 at 10:13PM CDT until June 23 at 10:45PM CDT by NWS Norman-Oklahoma City
info.description: The National Weather Service in Norman has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southwestern Wichita County in northern Texas... East central Foard County in northern Texas... Southern Wilbarger County in northern Texas... Northeastern Baylor County in northern Texas... * Until 1045 PM CDT. * At 1011 PM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 3 miles northeast of Grayback to 14 miles northwest of Lake Diversion to 6 miles northwest of Lake Kemp, moving southeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...70 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. The greatest hail threat exists between Lockett and Grayback. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect considerable tree damage. Wind damage is also likely to mobile homes, roofs, and outbuildings. * Locations impacted include... Vernon, Electra, Lockett, Lake Diversion, Thalia, Harrold, Grayback, and northeastern Lake Kemp. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...70 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
